item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: Thank you Mo for all your support. You guys are the best. Corona has such a great community and the Corona Ambassadors have been incredible. Two hundred shows sounds great to me :)
item.content:encoded: Thank you Mo for all your support. You guys are the best. Corona has such a great community and the Corona Ambassadors have been incredible. Two hundred shows sounds great to me ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Mo
item.dc:creator: Mo
item.description:
100 shows!!! CONGRATS Charles! Along with the the forum, this show is the BEST part of Corona!!! Please keep up coming!
Also, great conversation about Admob! I wish I there:) Unfortutely I am working on a project and Mondays (and the rest of the week work!) do not allow me to be present. Thanks God for these recordings.
@Sergey, did you by any chance compare admob and Chartboost full screens ads? In term of eCPM.
Thanks a again Charles for all you work and hope to be able to join before you reach show 200!
Mo
item.content:encoded:
100 shows!!! CONGRATS Charles! Along with the the forum, this show is the BEST part of Corona!!! Please keep up coming!

Also, great conversation about Admob! I wish I there:) Unfortutely I am working on a project and Mondays (and the rest of the week work!) do not allow me to be present. Thanks God for these recordings.

@Sergey, did you by any chance compare admob and Chartboost full screens ads? In term of eCPM.

Thanks a again Charles for all you work and hope to be able to join before you reach show 200!

Mo
